Topic.Title: Cash in Inventory and repeat items

Posts.EditableText: How do I have multiple sums of money (coins/notes) available scattered throughout the game that would increase the player's currency. Because this is a time travel story there is also the challenge of using different currencies for different time periods... Any advice would be appreciated!
